td.p: [[RecipientName]] was unable to pass the security check, and was therefore unable to activate their account.
To unlock the activation, go to Manage Users, select the user, and click "Send Activation". You will have the opportunity to re-enter the same or new code, or send without an access code.
Be sure to communicate the access code to the user.
DocuSign. The fastest way to get a signature.®

td.p: [[SenderName]] has requested their documents to be signed and notarized.
In order to sign and notarize the documents, you must first select a notary public. Please locate a notary public and request that they witness your signing using the "Assign a Notary" link below.
In the meantime, you can review the documents which you will be asked to sign:
Alternately, you can access these documents by visiting [[DocumentValidiationCodeUrl]], clicking the "Access Documents" link, and using this security code:

language.data:
[[EmailTitle]] From: [[SenderName]] ([[SenderEmail]])[[SenderCompany]]
Hello [[RecipientName]],
The sender has requested their documents to be signed and notarized. In order to sign and notarize the documents, you must first select a DocuSign Notary. Please locate a notary and assign them to the envelope by having them register using the "Assign a Notary" link below.
[[AssignNotaryURL]]
If you like, you may click the "Preview Documents" link below prior to the signing session to preview the documents you will be signing with the notary.
[[PreviewURL]]
Thank you! [[SenderName]]
Find a Notary [[FindNotaryUrl]]
Alternately, you can access these documents by visiting [[DocumentValidiationCodeUrl]], clicking the "Access Documents" link, and using this security code: [[DocumentCode]]

td.p: [[SenderName]] has requested you act as notary public for an electronic signature ceremony.
To complete this process, please follow these steps:
STEP 1: Sign into your DocuSign account and assure that your commission information is up to date.
STEP 2: Contact the signer to set up a time and location to sign:
STEP 3: When you are with the signer, begin the signing ceremony.
Alternately, you can access these documents by visiting [[DocumentValidiationCodeUrl]], clicking the "Access Documents" link, and using this security code:

td.p: [[SenderName]] has requested you act as notary public for an electronic signature ceremony.
To complete this process, please follow these steps:
STEP 1: Register with DocuSign as a notary public.
In order to notarize the documents and conduct a signing session with a client, you must be registered with DocuSign as a notary public. If you do not yet have an account, click here to register.
STEP 2: Contact Signer to set up a time and location to sign.
STEP 3: When you are with the signer, begin the signing ceremony.
Alternately, you can access these documents by visiting [[DocumentValidiationCodeUrl]], clicking the "Access Documents" link, and using this security code:
DocuSign. The fastest way to get a signature.®

To complete this process, please follow these steps:
STEP 1: Register as a DocuSign E-Notary.
In order to notarize the documents and conduct a signing session with a client, you must be a registered DocuSign E-notary. If you do not yet have an account, use the link below to register.
[[NotaryLoginURL]]
STEP 2: Contact Signer to set up a time and location to sign.
[[SignerName]] [[SignerEmail]] [[SignerPhone]] [[SignerAddress]]
STEP 3: When you are with the signer, begin the signing ceremony.
Alternately, you can access these documents by visiting [[DocumentValidiationCodeUrl]], clicking the "Access Documents" link, and using this security code: [[DocumentCode]]

[[QuickURL]] If clicking the link does not work, you can highlight and copy the entire line above and paste it into your browser to get started. This message was sent on behalf of [[OriginalRecipientName]] by the DocuSign Online Signing Service. If you would like to contact the sender, you can send email to [[SenderEmail]].

p.b: You recently started signing a document that required email validation.
The Email Validation Code for the document called "[[SubjectInput]]" appears below. Please type or copy this code and paste it into your browser to continue your signing process.

td.p: If you have closed the browser session that generated this email validation code, you may continue your signing process by clicking below. Signing will not be complete until you have reviewed the document and you have confirmed your signature.
If you DID NOT start signing documents from [[SenderName]] today, you should immediately notify us.
DocuSign. The fastest way to get a signature.®

td.p: 5Star Life Insurance Company's online enrollment employs DocuSign, the global standard for digital transaction management. In order to complete your account on 5Star's enrollment system, this email establishes your password/security settings in the DocuSign system (for your convenience, we recommend you use the same password as in your 5Star Enrollment System registration). Please click the button below to finish your account activation.

Note that, upon activation, you will be logged into the DocuSign system merely as confirmation. However, thereafter please proceed to 5Star Life's online enrollment main page at http://5StarEnroll.com.
Thank you for choosing 5Star Life Insurance!
DocuSign. The fastest way to get a signature.®

Note that, upon activation, you will be logged into the DocuSign system merely as confirmation. However, thereafter please proceed to 5Star Life's online enrollment main page at http://5StarEnroll.com

td.p: FaxId [[FaxId]] was received but our records indicate you chose to cancel the fax transmission.
The fax was intended for envelope [[EnvelopeID]].
If it was not your intention to cancel this fax transaction, please contact our support staff to correct this by doing one of the following:
1) Forward this email with a note indicating that you want the contents of the fax incorporated into the envelope (envelope [[EnvelopeID]]).
2) Go to http://www.docusign.com/support and choose one of the support options; please indicate the FaxId ([[FaxId]]) and EnvelopeId ([[EnvelopeID]]) when you reach a member of our support team.
DocuSign. The fastest way to get a signature.®
